TopicTitle: Any way to remove the green highlights?

Articles.Content: Any way to remove the green highlights? When you hover your mouse over parts.
are you talking about the outer highlight, or the general highlight? the outer outline can be disabled from the in game settings menu.

When they get stuck on, while you're in flight?

I've had success by running the mouse over the part(s) in the staging column on the left.

Now that I think about it, that hasn't happened to me in a while. When I first started playing .90 I had it all the time, but it rarely happens now. Don't know what I did to 'remove' it.

Alt-enter

Then you can take screens without having the mouse over the window.
There's Glow Suppressor that "suppresses all the glowing effects on parts: when you hover your mouse above a part, it will not glow green anymore". Could be what you're after?
